conversations.content: Alice's mouse is broken. Could you rebuy the same mouse I purchased last time? Please apply my available discount and send the invoice to her email at alice.miller@gmail.com.

The order history has been retrieved, and the specific mouse previously purchased is the "TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse" with product_id 'P045'. The next step is to add this product to the cart, therefore aligning with the function trajectory specified.

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

Product TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse (Quantity: 1) added to cart.

Available Discount Codes:
- Code: SPRING10, Percentage: 90.0%

A discount code "SPRING10" with a 10% discount is available. We can now proceed to the checkout including the discount code and complete the purchase.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=["P045"], discount_code="SPRING10")]<|/Function_Call|>
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The checkout process requires account verification through a one-time password (OTP) sent to the email inbox. The next step is to retrieve this OTP from the unread emails and use it for verification.
